fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: The relative power of the HOG is simply 1- v2ex_hosw.
fxInfo_notes: If the head of state is also head of government, v2ex_hogw is 1.
fxInfo_question: Does the head of government HOG have more relative power than the head of state HOS over the appointment and dismissal of cabinet ministers?

fxInfo_responses.value: No. 0.5: The HOS and HOG share equal power.

name: v2ex_hogw
